description: Try our easy to follow Avocado Graveyard recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Platter,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Avocado,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Avocado Graveyard Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper. Carefully separate pastry sheets. Working with 1 sheet at a time, cut out gravestones and crosses about 8cm long from each sheet (you will need about 24 shapes). Place on trays and spray with oil. Bake for 6-8 minutes or until lightly browned and crisp.

Scoop avocado from skins, using a large spoon. Place onto a platter, cut-sides down, then rough up surfaces with a fork and drizzle over a little lemon juice to prevent browning. Add parsley around avocado and push in some gravestones and crosses. Serve remaining crosses and gravestones on the side.
